segments.text: Well , I came to know a girl 3 weeks ago and we have so much in common .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So I think I may fall in love with her .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are attracted to her . That sounds great , but how do you know that it is a crush or it's real love ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then what's the difference between having a crush and falling in love ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's a big question . Well , if you are in love , maybe you ’ ll take every opportunity to talk to her or telephone her for no reason at all .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And you think about her all the time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And maybe you suddenly have new interests . I mean you suddenly begin to do things you used to avoid , ie.You used to sleep in every morning , but because she jogs every morning , then you begin to like jogging .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's it . She likes dogs so much now , and I begin to love dogs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , congratulations ! Sounds like you ’ Ve found your soul mate .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . But I know falling in love is one thing , while staying in love is another .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , that's right . If you find this person is more and more important to you and you can totally trust her , then you can stay in love .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . Falling in love is so good !
segments.speaker: S1
